title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Fixed documentation inaccuracies: Clarified that logical OR/AND label filtering applies only to issues (not pull requests) in issue tracking docs.
Added new `job.check_run_id` property to GitHub Actions context: Provides the check run ID for the current job, available in Free/Pro/Team/Enterprise Cloud plans.
summary:
- Fixed documentation inaccuracies: Clarified that logical OR/AND label filtering applies only to issues (not pull requests) in issue tracking docs.
- Added new `job.check_run_id` property to GitHub Actions context: Provides the check run ID for the current job, available in Free/Pro/Team/Enterprise Cloud plans.
generated_title: Fix issue label filtering docs & add job.check_run_id context
commits: **ecfdce7**: Fix inaccurate documentation about logical OR/AND label filtering for pull requests (#57523) (by Copilot)
**2d8b1f0**: Add Actions `job.check_run_id` expression context (#57502) (by eric sciple)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Fixed documentation inaccuracies: Clarified that logical OR/AND label filtering applies only to issues (not pull requests) in issue tracking docs.
- Added new `job.check_run_id` property to GitHub Actions context: Provides the check run ID for the current job, available in Free/Pro/Team/Enterprise Cloud plans.

### Title  
Fix issue label filtering docs & add job.check_run_id context
